markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Angel](/Traits.aspx?ID=8)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 628 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

This family of [celestials](/Traits.aspx?ID=23) is native to the plane of [Nirvana](/Planes.aspx?ID=20). Most angels are neutral good, have [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), and have a weakness to evil damage.
name: Angel
